pr_title: Update Bigtable version to 1.14.0 and switch shaded dependency to 2x

timeline.message:
Update Bigtable version to 1.14.0 and switch shaded dependency to 2x

Signed-off-by: Kristen O'Leary <kaoleary@google.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Sorry, I should have clarified that you should add 1.14.z (wildcard) here, not just 1.14.0 specifically.
Also, adding just 1.14.z here implies that we don't recommend 1.12.z and 1.13.z versions (e.g., they're broken or incompatible with JanusGraph) — if there's nothing wrong with them, shouldn't we add them here as well?
timeline.author: mbrukman

replies.bodyText: gotcha! I only added 1.14.0 as the last version in this repo was for 1.11.0 - do you recommend we test out the versions in between as well? Will update from 1.14.0 to 1.14.z.
replies.author: kolea2

replies.bodyText:
If you are able to test with 1.12 and 1.13 that would be ideal. If not, we can keep just 1.14.z.
That said, I don't anticipate any issues with in-between client library versions, as they don't typically change semantics or behavior; it's primarily issues with dependencies or Hadoop profiles are the issues that we may run into.
replies.author: mbrukman

replies.bodyText: Sounds good. For now, I've updated the 1.14.z change for the changelog and will test out other versions in parallel to not delay this PR.
replies.author: kolea2

replies.bodyText:
That's great! We can update the docs separately, and fast-track this PR into the release.
Thanks again for your help!
replies.author: mbrukman
